content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * this airy triangle scarf is knit diagonally using stockinette and garter stitches ladders are created by dropping stitches as you knit and again near the end of your knitting sample scarf in pink is 54 inches across and 15 inches deep after blocking you will need 238 meters dk yarn the triangle shape remains constant as you knit just knit until you run out of yarn you may also use fingering weight with 3 50mm and 3 00mm needles blocking required enjoy pattern information number of pages 2 language s english instructions written sizes variable photos 2
